author: lathomas
body:
This PR is a change to the file containing the jets and photon prefiring maps related to ECAL prefiring for UL processing.  

- The UL2017 maps are slightly updated 
- New TH2F are added for UL2016, separately for pre and post VFP periods. 

The maps were derived using unprefirable events, as discussed in this talk which also presents a validation with dilepton events. 
https://lathomas.web.cern.ch/lathomas/TSGStuff/L1Prefiring/ecalprefiring_ul16and17.pdf
title: Update of UL2016 and 2017 ECAL prefiring maps (for jets and photons)
